member.name: P:Lacuna.Spa.Api.Applications.ApplicationData`4.Name
member.summary: The name of the application. Please note that application names are unique in each subscription.

member.name: P:Lacuna.Spa.Api.Applications.ApplicationData`4.AuthorizationData
member.summary: The application's roles on the subscription. Fill this field only when creating an application on a subscription. When creating a "system admin" application, ignore this field and specify the field `RootAuthorizationData` instead.

member.name: P:Lacuna.Spa.Api.Applications.ApplicationData`4.RootAuthorizationData
member.summary: The application's global roles. Fill this field only when creating a "system admin" application. When creating an application on a subscription, ignore this field and specify the field `AuthorizationData` instead.

member.name: P:Lacuna.Spa.Api.PaginatedSearchParams.Q
member.summary: Text query term to filter the results (optional)

member.name: P:Lacuna.Spa.Api.PaginatedSearchParams.Limit
member.summary: The maximum number of records that should be returned. If implementing pagination, use this as the page size. If omitted, the default limit of 10 records is returned.

member.name: P:Lacuna.Spa.Api.PaginatedSearchParams.Offset
member.summary: The number of records at the beginning of the list to be skipped. If implementing pagination, multiply the page number (0-based) by the page size to get this number.

member.name: P:Lacuna.Spa.Api.PaginatedSearchParams.Cursor
member.summary: Contains information about the first element on a page. If in a cursor based search and the cursor is null, it is not necessary to filter the items by the cursor.

member.name: P:Lacuna.Spa.Api.PaginatedSearchParams.Order
member.summary: Denotes if records should be ordered in an ascending or descending order.
